attributes.additional_details:
Transgender people have to wait upto a year to see a specialist at a Gender clinic, We Transgender people have a hard enough time dealing with issues without having to wait upto a year to be seen after seeing a psychiatrist.

Quicker reffereal times are needed or more places to be utilised, so that we can get more help not just to progress with a gender change but for added support, currently we are left in limbo for upto a year sometimes without much knowlege of what happens.
